attributes.action: Allow all Gurhka's and their families the right to remain in this country upon completion of service, regardless of when and where they served for this country, or for how long
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These fine men have served the British people with loyalty and dedication for many years, they deserve to be treated with fairness and dignity. We should be ashamed that our government sees fit to discard and throw out such fine men, after having served for Queen & Country for many years.They should be given automatic British citizenship upon leaving our forces,not discarded as rubbish if they do not fit into the appropriate laid down time scale.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
